ClockMode.ConfigTooltip: How the in-game clock behaves when the game speed is altered. This can also be changed using a keybind during gameplay.
DecrementSpeed.ConfigTooltip: The keybind to slow time down.
IncrementSpeed.ConfigTooltip: The keybind to speed time up.
ResetSpeed.ConfigTooltip: The keybind to reset game speed to its original value.
CycleClockMode.ConfigTooltip: The keybind to cycle the clock mode during gameplay.
